text:
@realDonaldTrump No national testing program. Still not enough PPE. 21 red states spiking. 
Apr. 29. Jared Kushner, as the US coronavirus death toll surpasses the Vietnam War and approaches 60,000: "This is a great success story, and I think that's really what needs to be told."
